Description: This template creates a Project on the MongoDB Atlas API, this will be billed to your Atlas account.

BindPassword.Description: Password used to authenticate the bindUsername.

BindUsername.Description: User DN that Atlas uses to connect to the LDAP server. Write in the format of a full DN

Hostname.Description: FQDN or IP address of the host that serves the LDAP directory. This host must be visible to the internet or connected to your Atlas cluster with VPC Peering.

Port.Description: Port to which the LDAP server listens for client connections. This parameter use a default value of 636.

AuthorizationEnabled.Description: (OPTIONAL) LDAP authorization allows database users to be managed at LDAP group level.
